quote: We'll when he lets his guard down he's okay. Like when he just talks without checking his words or you catch him just looking at something like... He's really looking for the beauty in it.
quote_letters: WELL WHEN HE LETS HIS GUARD DOWN HES OKAY LIKE WHEN HE JUST TALKS WITHOUT CHECKING HIS WORDS OR YOU CATCH HIM JUST LOOKING AT SOMETHING LIKE HES REALLY LOOKING FOR THE BEAUTY IN IT
